special_abilities.name: Keen Sight.
special_abilities.desc: The griffon has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

actions.name: Multiattack.
actions.desc: The griffon makes two attacks: one with its beak and one with its claws.

actions.name: Beak.
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +0 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1 piercing damage.

actions.name: Claws.
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +0 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1 slashing damage.
